mapper.select: SELECT hotel_id hotelId, hotel_name hotelName,dest_id destId, address, point, star, image_num imageNum, description simpleDesc, can_book canBook FROM info WHERE hotel_id=#{hotelId}
SELECT hotel_id hotelId, p_title pTitle, p_desc pDesc FROM policies WHERE hotel_id=#{hotelId}

SELECT hotel_id hotelId, rooms.room_index roomIndex, room_name roomName, description,capacity,price,rooms.room_num-X.num roomNum, people_num peopleNum FROM rooms,(SELECT room_index,COUNT(*) num FROM booking WHERE hotel_id=#{hotelId} AND (check_in_date <= #{dateIn} OR check_out_date >= #{dateOut}) GROUP BY room_index) X WHERE rooms.room_index=X.room_index AND rooms.people_num >= #{peopleNum} AND rooms.hotel_id=#{hotelId}
